bio:
𑁍 say yes to new adventures 𑁍
photographer & art director - Frankfurt
✎ sarahpour@outlook.com

posts.caption:
Oh, those Croatian sunsets.
Could’ve spend hours overlooking Dubrovnik. The city itself is super crowded, way too expensive, but the view? Let’s me forget about all that. 🤤✨

If happiness is the goal - and it should be, then adventures should be a priority.

WANT A POSTCARD FROM ME?🙋🏻‍♀️
In today’s story I asked if anyone is interested in receiving a postcard from me and as sooo many of you participated - I am thinking of sending 5 out. 😁 For that tell me where is the farthest you’ve been from home and with whom have you been? ☺️
Will randomly pick 5 then. So looking forward to this!
Number one rule to be happy: don’t compare yourself to others. 💛

Wherever you go - I will go. And wherever you stay - I will stay.

Love how loyal dogs are. Even though when we human beings are the dumb ass$^%* we sometimes are. 🐶💛

Those natural pools are becoming my favourite. 💙
#croatia #croatiafulloflife
And she started to design a live she loved.✨#montenegro

Time to go home.♥️
.
After almost three months of travelling south-east Europe it is time for us to go home. You might have already seen it in my story - the last two days been a nightmare. After coming back from food shopping we saw that our car door was broken and almost all our gear stolen. But worst: We putted so much work, time and effort in taking all our photos, which I mostly not even have seen yet - thought “hey, enjoy this time. Edit a photo every now and then to post something. But leave the real editing fun for when your home.” and someone who has not a single use for them steals your hard disks. Gosh, I still don’t know how to feel. One moment I start laughing because dang, what actually did happen? The next moment I start crying because dang, I can’t even remember all the places I’ve been without my photos. .
I’m mostly not really “personal” on here. And because of that I’m even more thankful and really, really surprised about how many of you are trying to help us. It might be useless and don’t bring us our hard drives with all our photos back, but at least I know I tried what I can and know a lot of people helped with anything they could. As they say “it’s all about the community on here”. I cannot thank you guys enough, but trust me, every message I got where someone offering help, made me smile and realise it’s probably the best to do it the way we are doing. And who knows, maybe this crazy nightmare turns into a Disney story or something and we will be super duper lucky and get our photos somehow back. .
THANK YOU!!!! 🙏🏻♥️
Document the moments you feel most in love with yourself - what you’re wearing, who you’re around, what you’re doing. Recreate and repeat. 💛

A rainy summer day is good for the soul. 💛

Really like all the fall colours and already looking forward to the adventures I will have then - but I’m so not ready to let summer go. 🙈 who else feels the same?
Even if you go for it and it doesn’t work out, you still win. You still had the guts enough to head straight into something that frightened you. That type of bravery will take you places.

Perhaps this is what this season is all about: trusting in the unknowns, finding gold in the little things, trading fear of what’s uncertain for freedom to thrive within it.

Ridiculous story behind this photo: we’ve been searching for a good spot where we could take photos, with the mountains and the little Fjord in the background. We went all those damn stairs up (1300ish stairs!!), walked more and more and decided to take a little path I have found leading away from the stairs. Found a little “spot” where I was super enthusiastic about, made @saatmann and Loki climb with me down, none of us could stand even a little bit as we slipped more than anything - until, and now I’m happy he did, Christian said it’s enough and we need to go back, it’s too dangerous, that it’s not worth for a photo. Climbed up, me of course super pissed and just a few steps down we found this old wall. I might have not gotten the photo I first had in mind/wanted, but this experience is everything! 🤪😄 Poor Loki has the most exhausting life a dog could imagine. 😂

Some memories never leave your bones. Like salt in the sea, they become part of you. And you carry them. 💛

A morning in the Croatian „highlands“ enjoyed in our little adventure mobil @namarou.travels is one of them.
